feed.title: GitHub Haskell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Haskell in GitHub

entry.title: joehillen/acme-sip
entry.summary:
The fastest SIP echo server ever! Made possible by Haskell.

Based on acme-http, this is a experiment to see what the fastest, simplest SIP v2.0 server looks like in Haskell.

Works with both UDP and TCP.
